name: textView(_:shouldInteractWith:in:)
desc: Asks the delegate whether the specified text view allows user interaction with the specified URL in the specified range of text.DeprecatedUse textView(_:shouldInteractWith:in:interaction:) instead.
declaration:
optional func textView(_ textView: UITextView, 
    shouldInteractWith URL: URL, 
                    in characterRange: NSRange) -> Bool
